授業目的: In this course, we will try to find out how entrepreneurship and innovation could help revive the countryside in the EU and in Japan. We will look at different case studies, analysing their reasons for success as well as their future potential for growth.
到達目標: You will learn not only about how to foster innovation and entrepreneurship, but learn how different EU countries promote innovation and entrepreneurship. You will also acquire many soft skills, such as independent research skills, discussion & presentation skills, case-study experience and critical thinking, among others.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This is a highly interactive course. Active student participation is absolutely vital for the success of this course.
This course requires a lot of group work and independent research.

第2回: Entrepreneurship & innovation: What is it? How do we achieve it?
第5回: Examples of entrepreneurship & innovation in the countryside
第6回: Examples of entrepreneurship & innovation in the countryside (EU and Japan)
第8回: How governments promote entrepreneurship and innovation: is it working?
第9回: Can entrepreneurship & innovation save the countryside? If yes, to what extent and how?
